title: Looking for the owner of the second T206 Weimer Ghost image
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: Looking for the owner of the second T206 Weimer Ghost image
posts.post_content:
I am aware of Johnny V's example. But I also know there is a second out there. I would like to talk to that person to see if they are interested in selling their card.
For those who dont know what Im talking about the card looks like this:

[IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/weimer.jpg[/IMG]

If you are aware of the current owner please PM me or email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Thanks
Jamie
PS: I'm interested in any ghost image with a player pictured on the back, or a different player (from the one in the card) pictured on the front.
